artist: Artist: Attributed to Polidoro da Caravaggio
description: standing figure wearing a draping cloak with only the PL arm exposed, with PL hand holding a round object; long wavy beard and wavy hair; smiling face; wavy fur visible beneath cloak
inscription:
Inscription

on back, in pencil: [17] and [32]
provenance: Purchased by Prof. Moir from Alister Mathews, Bournemouth, England, in the 1970s
title: Study of a Statue of Pan
